articles.description: The latest Exynos chip in the Samsung Galaxy S22+ is laughably bad compared to the iPhone's A15.
articles.content:
Skip to contentType your search and hit enter
If there’s one Android handset that’s comparable to the iPhone, it’s Samsung’s latest Galaxy S phone. More than the Pixel 6 Pro, OnePlus 9, or whatever … [+5491 chars]
